response.original_title: Die Poesie der Form - Der Bildhauer Wander Bertoni
response.overview: The sculptor Wander Bertoni would have been 100 years old on October 11th this year. Hardly any other visual artist has left as many works in public places as Wahlburgenl√§nder, who died in his beloved Gritsch Mill in 2019. His artistic oeuvre is distinctive and diverse. Wander Bertoni's life is a journey through an eventful century.
response.title: Die Poesie der Form - Der Bildhauer Wander Bertoni
